item.description:
*****************IMPORTANT!!***********************
All this week, it's rained, rained, rained, and it's going to rain again on Sunday! Although the Puggies don't mind getting muddy, the people do, so I have rescheduled the second South of Boston Pug May Meetup to Sunday, May 21, 2006!

We've had our first meetup for all those Puggies who live south of Boston, and we're ready to have another! Once again, I will volunteer my fenced yard in Brockton, MA (don't worry, it's a perfectly safe neighborhood of single family homes!), and we can discuss locations for future meetings.

We'll provide biscuits (Old Mother Hubbard, my favorite! sez Clovis) and water for the puggies and coffee and donuts for the Pugaholics.

Other small dogs are welcome, but please ask in advance if you can bring dogs other than Pugs. If you have a bully on your hands, you can bring him too - but be prepared to keep an eye on him. We want everyone to have fun!

group.name: The South of Boston Pug Meetup Group

item.name: The South of Boston Pug May Meetup
